Fourth tallest mountain in North America

Description

Mount Denali, formerly known as Mount McKinley, is the highest mountain in North America and the highest peak in North America and the world, excluding Mauna Kea. Denali is in the State of Alaska, on the North American continent. It is the centerpiece of Denali National Park and Preserve.
